verses.text: And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* toward \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w drop|strong="H5197"\w* \add thy word\add* toward the holy \w places|strong="H4720"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, and will draw \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* out of his \w sheath|strong="H8593"\w*, and will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from thee the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w Seeing|strong="H3282"\w* then that I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from thee the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, therefore shall my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of his \w sheath|strong="H8593"\w* against all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* from the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* to the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*:

That all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have drawn \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* out of his \w sheath|strong="H8593"\w*: it shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* any more.

\w Sigh|strong="H0584"\w* therefore, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, with the \w breaking|strong="H7670"\w* of \add thy\add* \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*; and with \w bitterness|strong="H4814"\w* \w sigh|strong="H0584"\w* before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

And it shall be, when they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Wherefore \w sighest|strong="H0584"\w* thou? that thou shalt \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*, For the \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w*; because it \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*: and every \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w melt|strong="H4549"\w*, and all \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* shall be \w feeble|strong="H7503"\w*, and every \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* shall \w faint|strong="H3543"\w*, and all \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* shall be \w weak|strong="H3212"\w* \add as\add* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: behold, it \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, and shall be brought to \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 21.7 \ft shall be weak…: Heb. shall go into water\f*
¶ Again the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w Say|strong="H0559"\w*, A \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* is \w sharpened|strong="H2300"\w*, and also \w furbished|strong="H4803"\w*:

It is \w sharpened|strong="H2300"\w* to make a \w sore|strong="H2874"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2873"\w*; it is \w furbished|strong="H4178"\w* that it may \w glitter|strong="H1300"\w*: \w should|strong="H0176"\w* we then make \w mirth|strong="H7797"\w*? it \w contemneth|strong="H3988"\w* the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \add as\add* every \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.\f + \fr 21.10 \ft it contemneth…: or, it is the rod of my son, it despiseth every tree\f*

And he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it to be \w furbished|strong="H4803"\w*, that it may be \w handled|strong="H3709"\w*: this \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* is \w sharpened|strong="H2300"\w*, and it is \w furbished|strong="H4178"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w slayer|strong="H2026"\w*.

\w Cry|strong="H2199"\w* and \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*: for it shall be upon my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, it \add shall be\add* upon all the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w terrors|strong="H4048"\w* by reason \w of|strong="H0413"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall be upon my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w smite|strong="H5606"\w* therefore upon \add thy\add* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*.\f + \fr 21.12 \ft terrors…: or, they are thrust down to the sword with my people\f*

Because \add it is\add* a \w trial|strong="H0974"\w*, and what if \add the sword\add* \w contemn|strong="H3988"\w* even the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*? it shall be no \add more\add*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 21.13 \ft Because…: or, When the trial hath been, what then? shall they not also belong to the despising rod?\f*

Thou therefore, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \add thine\add* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w together|strong="H5221"\w*, and let the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* be \w doubled|strong="H3717"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* time, the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*: it \add is\add* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add men that are\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, which entereth into their privy \w chambers|strong="H2314"\w*.\f + \fr 21.14 \ft hands…: Heb. hand to hand\f*

I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w point|strong="H0019"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* against all their \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, that \add their\add* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* may \w faint|strong="H4127"\w*, and \add their\add* \w ruins|strong="H4383"\w* be \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*: \w ah|strong="H0253"\w*! \add it is\add* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w bright|strong="H1300"\w*, \add it is\add* wrapped \w up|strong="H4593"\w* for the \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*.\f + \fr 21.15 \ft point: or, glittering, or, fear\f*\f + \fr 21.15 \ft wrapped up: or, sharpened\f*

Go thee one way or \w other|strong="H0258"\w*, \add either\add* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* the right \w hand|strong="H3231"\w*, \add or\add* on the \w left|strong="H8041"\w*, \w whithersoever|strong="H0575"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \add is\add* \w set|strong="H3259"\w*.\f + \fr 21.16 \ft or on…: Heb. set thyself, take the left hand\f*

I will also \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* mine \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w together|strong="H3709"\w*, and I will cause my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*: I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.
¶ The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me again, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Also, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, that the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* may \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: both \w twain|strong="H8147"\w* shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and \w choose|strong="H1254"\w* thou a \w place|strong="H3027"\w*, \w choose|strong="H1254"\w* \add it\add* at the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w Appoint|strong="H7760"\w* a \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, that the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* may \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Rabbath|strong="H7237"\w* of the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, and to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* the \w defenced|strong="H1219"\w*.

For the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* at the \w parting|strong="H0517"\w* of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, at the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, to \w use|strong="H7080"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w*: he made \add his\add* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \w bright|strong="H7043"\w*, he \w consulted|strong="H7592"\w* with \w images|strong="H8655"\w*, he \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*.\f + \fr 21.21 \ft parting of: Heb. mother of\f*\f + \fr 21.21 \ft arrows: or, knives\f*\f + \fr 21.21 \ft images: Heb. teraphim\f*

At his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* was the \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* for \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* \w captains|strong="H3733"\w*, to \w open|strong="H6605"\w* the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* in the \w slaughter|strong="H7524"\w*, to lift \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* with \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w*, to \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* \add battering\add* \w rams|strong="H3733"\w* against the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, to \w cast|strong="H8210"\w* a \w mount|strong="H5550"\w*, \add and\add* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* a \w fort|strong="H1785"\w*.\f + \fr 21.22 \ft captains: or, battering rams: Heb. rams\f*

And it shall be unto them as a \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w divination|strong="H7080"\w* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, to them that have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w oaths|strong="H7621"\w*: but he will call to \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, that they may be \w taken|strong="H8610"\w*.\f + \fr 21.23 \ft to them…: or, for the oaths made unto them\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because ye have made your \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* to be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*, in that your \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* are \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w*, so that in all your \w doings|strong="H5949"\w* your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* do \w appear|strong="H7200"\w*; because, \add I say\add*, that ye are come to \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w*, ye shall be \w taken|strong="H8610"\w* with the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*.

¶ And thou, \w profane|strong="H2491"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whose \w day|strong="H3117"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \add shall have\add* an \w end|strong="H7093"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Remove|strong="H5493"\w* the \w diadem|strong="H4701"\w*, and take \w off|strong="H7311"\w* the \w crown|strong="H5850"\w*: this \add shall\add* not \add be\add* the \w same|strong="H2063"\w*: \w exalt|strong="H1361"\w* \add him that is\add* \w low|strong="H8217"\w*, and \w abase|strong="H8213"\w* \add him that is\add* \w high|strong="H1364"\w*.

I will \w overturn|strong="H5754"\w*, \w overturn|strong="H5754"\w*, \w overturn|strong="H5754"\w*, it: and it shall \w be|strong="H7760"\w* no \add more\add*, until he \w come|strong="H0935"\w* whose \w right|strong="H4941"\w* it is; and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it \add him\add*.\f + \fr 21.27 \ft I will overturn…: Heb. Perverted, perverted, perverted, will I make it\f*

¶ And thou, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* concerning the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, and concerning their \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*; even \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thou, The \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add is\add* \w drawn|strong="H6605"\w*: for the \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w* \add it is\add* \w furbished|strong="H4803"\w*, to \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* because of the \w glittering|strong="H1300"\w*:

Whiles they \w see|strong="H2372"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w* unto thee, whiles they \w divine|strong="H7080"\w* a \w lie|strong="H3577"\w* unto thee, to \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* thee upon the \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* of \add them that are\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, whose \w day|strong="H3117"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w when|strong="H6256"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \add shall have\add* an \w end|strong="H7093"\w*.

Shall I cause \add it\add* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into his \w sheath|strong="H8593"\w*? I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thee in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where thou wast \w created|strong="H1254"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of thy \w nativity|strong="H4351"\w*.\f + \fr 21.30 \ft Shall…: or, Cause it to return\f*

And I will pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* mine \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w* upon thee, I will \w blow|strong="H6315"\w* against thee in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of my \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w brutish|strong="H1197"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \add and\add* \w skilful|strong="H2796"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H4889"\w*.\f + \fr 21.31 \ft brutish: or, burning\f*

Thou shalt be for \w fuel|strong="H0402"\w* to the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; thou shalt be no \add more\add* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.
